attributes.action: Justice For Young People To Be Able To Buy Their First Home
attributes.additional_details: We petition the government, who through taxpayer money own large stakes in our major banks, to provide a system whereby the mortgage lenders are obliged to supply 95% mortgages at no more than 3% above bank base rate, to our sons and daughters, enabling them to purchase their first home, giving them a sense of belonging to the community, an ability to fulfill their aspirations, and a pathway to stability and the first steps along the pathway of creating the next generations.
